question: A cheeky seagull swoops down, picks up your golf ball, and drops it right next to the hole. What do you do?*

choices.text: Thank the seagull for its help, and take your next shot from where the ball landed
Replace your ball back to where it was before the seagull moved it, with no penalty.
Play the ball from its new position and add a stroke to your score as a 'seagull penalty.'
Offer a snack to the seagull in hopes it will do the same on the next hole.

explanation: It has happened! Check out this video You have to put a ball back where the seagull picked it up
